channel.title: XergioAleX - CTO & Co-founder at DailyBot (YC S21)
channel.description: Sergio Alexander Florez Galeano — CTO & Co-founder at DailyBot (YC S21). Full Stack Developer, MSc in Data Science, speaker, maker, and tech entrepreneur with 10+ years building digital products.

item.title: Introduction to Meteor.js
item.description: Introductory talk to Meteor.js — full-stack reactive framework, with a live demo building a real-time chat in minutes.

item.description: Introduction to NoSQL databases and MongoDB — differences with SQL, when to use each, and practical examples.

item.description: Introductory talk on IoT — sensors, actuators, controllers, and programming your first robot with Arduino and Johnny-five.

item.description: Talk at Universidad de Caldas on blockchain — origins, history of money, and building apps that consume blockchain services from JavaScript.

item.description: Intro to blockchain, Bitcoin, Ethereum, and smart contracts — with a Solidity demo, at PereiraJs.

item.description: Building modern microservices architectures using GraphQL for API communication.

item.description: Bridging the gap between academic deep learning research and practical industry applications. Presented at PyCon.

item.description: Extended version exploring deep learning models driving AI evolution toward industry optimization.

item.description: From the history of money to blockchain — gold, trust, the 2008 crisis, and how Bitcoin and Ethereum work.

item.description: Getting started with Go — syntax, concurrency, standard library, and building efficient applications.

item.description: A detailed analysis of the original Bitcoin whitepaper written by Satoshi Nakamoto.
